snippet.title: Carmen Sandiego | Pre-Order Trailer | Available March 4th
snippet.description:
🚨 The chase begins! 🚨 Pre-orders for Carmen Sandiego are now LIVE on Steam, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PS5! Secure your copy and be the first to join Carmen’s global adventure.🌍

Wishlist today at https://store.steampowered.com/app/2475300/Carmen_Sandiego/

Find out more on: 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/theofficialcarmensandiego
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/CarmenSandiego
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/carmensandiego/ 

******************************

Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com​​ 
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central​​

Don't forget to follow us on social media:

Facebook: https://gmlft.co/Gameloft-Facebook​​
Twitter: https://gmlft.co/Gameloft-Twitter​​
Instagram: https://gmlft.co/Gameloft-Instagram​​
YouTube: https://gmlft.co/Gameloft-YouTube​​

***
© 2024 Gameloft. All Rights Reserved
